Q

quit() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.connection.server.ServerConnection
Notify Clients that the connection is being closed, then close the connections.
quitAndReset(ClientConnection) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.connection.server.ServerConnection
If the game has already started and the Client who quit was a playing player: quits the connection with every Client and resets the Server to accept new ones; else: do not reset the Server.
QuitEvent - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.view.events
Event: Player wants to quit the game.
QuitEvent() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.view.events.QuitEvent
Constructs a QuitEvent to notify the Server the intention of the player to quit.
QuitExecuter - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewCore.executers.executerClasses
Class to execute the Quitting.
QuitExecuter() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewCore.executers.executerClasses.QuitExecuter
constructor
quitHandler(Object) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.connection.server.SocketClientConnection
Takes an Object message as an argument, determines if it is a QuitEvent, then execute quitting operation for the Client.
